attributes.action: No MP or PM should get any payoff or pension as a result of the expenses scandal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
No MP or PM should get any payoff or pension as a result of the expenses scandal or when they stand down at the
next election or lose the election.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
